name: RepliCat
description:
Cats have 9 lives, they say. So do you. Because you're a cat!

Controls:

  •  WASD for movements and jumps.
  •  Spacebar to spawn a dead cat that can be used as a step/block to climb on and reach your goal.
  • Press 'R' to restart the level.

Rules: You only have 8 extra lives in the beginning (as you are a cat!). Spawning a dead cat decreases your lives count by 1.
